page.title: 11Recreation and Leisure
page.content:
People in the project area were questioned on this subject on Friday 7 June 1985. The age category of the people was sought using blocks of 10 years. 792 people responded and gave information. The most popular activity was TV watching(75), followed by reading(59), music listening(57), knitting(54) and the pub(51). In the age 11-20 snooker/pool(20) was the most popular followed by music listening(18) and TV(17).
21-30: TV(26), Pub(20), Music(12) 31-40: Knitting(19), TV(15), Music(13) Reading(13) 41-50: Gardening(8), Reading(8), TV(5) Darts(5) 51-60: Knitting(10), Reading(7) Pub(7)
Over 60: Gardening(15), Reading(12), Knitting(11)
